abstract: Paul Stenquist, a frequent contributor to Wheels, relates the tale of acquiring and returning a Bel Air to its spiritual home.
snippet: Paul Stenquist, a frequent contributor to Wheels, relates the tale of acquiring and returning a Bel Air to its spiritual home.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Automobiles section, as part of The Times's coverage of the Chevrolet centennial, Tony Swan reviews a 1955 Chevrolet Bel Air convertible. The '55 models were a breakthrough in styling, performance and refinement that set the stage for Chevy's starring role in American life for decades.

headline.main: Road Trip: Returning a '55 Chevy Bel Air to Its Detroit Roots
